unnormalised: Arrey bhai, the India vs Pak cricket match is on 27/08/2024! That's like, ages away! I'll probably have aged 5 yrs by then. Hope they don't prepone it to 15/08 (Independence Day clashes, lol!) or post it to 2025! My chai will get cold just waiting. #CricketFever #IndVsPak #WaitingGame
